|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Default settings are per '''Micronet''''s manual. :The sample SSID specified in the manual is '''wireless'''. The OUIs used are 00:05:B4 ('''Aceex''') for WAN/LAN and 02:05:B4 for WLAN. Both OUIs have a fair number of '''wireless''' SSIDs attributed to them in the '''WiGLE''' DB. ==Links of Interest== [http://yummy.micronet.tw/up_images/english/4/361/SP916GL_Manual.pdf Manual]
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=170071 On the DD-WRT forums] (w/ internal pictures) :16MB [[Winbond]] W9812G2GH-6 + 8MB [[EtronTech]] EM638325TS-6 > 24MB total RAM :Z-Com XG-623G wireless module (the FCC ID and FCC date of the XG-623G has been applied to this entry) :"TurBoard" appears to be silkscreened on the main board. [[Category:English Documentation]]
